welcome: Welcome to Simple AI (simple-ai.io)! 🚀 Simple AI is an AI chat application powered by OpenAI's GPT-4 Turbo, integrated with WolframAlpha (Enhanced Knowledge & Mathematics), Midjourney (High Quality Image Generation), and Vectara (Vector Database Indexing), among other practical tools. It offers a minimalistic design packed with rich features, faster operations and a more professional user experience, making it an excellent ChatGPT alternative. Just type your query and press `Enter` to chat with the AI.💬
quick_start_0: Simple AI operates using a command interface, shortcuts and gestures. Commands all begin with `:` (half-width colon).
quick_start_1:
Before starting to use, take 10s to register a user with command `:user add [username] [email] [password?]`, and a 30K free tokens will be given to you.🎁
Note: Do not include the brackets in your command.✅
For example, `:user add john john@example.com ********`.🔑
quick_start_2: To log in, use the command `:login [username] [password]`.
quick_start_3: If you forgot your password, reset it using the command `:user reset pass [username] [email]`.🆘
quick_start_4: To access the documentation and confirm usage, click the dot (•) in the screen corner.📄
quick_start_5: To navigate between chat histories, use the `⬅️` and `➡️` arrow keys. (Or swipe left and right on smartphones.📱) To navigate between `sessions`, use the `⬆️` and `⬇️` arrow keys.
quick_start_6: After logging in, use `:use "Midjourney"` to enable image generation.⛵ Use `:use "WolframAlpha"` to enable enhanced mathematics.🏛️ Tips: use the `Tab` key to autocomplete.💡
quick_start_7: Switch to fullscreen with `F11` (⌃F11 for macOS). For split screen, use `Ctrl+|`.🖥️
quick_start_9: A general `user` account is free, but you have to pay for OpenAI API tokens. You can manage your token balance on the Usage page.💳
quick_start_10: Invite friends using the command `:invite [email]`, and both of you will receive 100K award tokens!💌
